org.jfree.chart.panel

Class AbstractMouseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfree.chart.panel.AbstractMouseHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PanHandler, RegionSelectionHandler, ZoomHandler

    public class AbstractMouseHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener
    A handler for mouse events in a ChartPanel. A handler can be assigned a modifier and installed on the panel to be invoked by the user.
    Since:
    1.2.0
